short_summary: Multiple VICTORIA-Class Spares – Valves and Disks
full_summary:
=====================================================================

**Multiple VICTORIA-Class Spares – Valves and Disks**
=====================================================

**Reference Number**: cb-7632-6253352
**Amendment Number**: 8
**Solicitation Number**: W8482-241880/A

**Tender Announcement**
-----------------------

The Department of National Defence is seeking proposals for the supply of VICTORIA-Class spares, consisting of valves and disks, to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt and CFB Halifax.

**Items Required**

* Item 1: DISK,VALVE (NSN: 99-1584763) - Quantity: 4
* Item 2: VALVE,BUTTERFLY (NSN: 99-7299326) - Quantity: 4

**Additional Requirements**

* Bidders must provide the brand name, model, and/or part number and NCAGE (North American Industry Classification System) code for the proposed product.
* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Trade Agreements**
-------------------

This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement (FIPA-Panama)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

**Additional Information**
-------------------------

* The tender deadline is January 17, 2024, at 14:00:00.
* The selection criteria for this tender is Lowest Price.
* The procurement method is Competitive – Traditional.
* The contracting authority is the Department of National Defence, 101 Colonel By Dr., Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K2.

**Contact Information**
---------------------

Jeffrey Milks
Jeffrey.Milks@forces.gc.ca
(999) 999-9999

**Attachments**
---------------

The tender package includes the following attachments:

* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/763
